/*	Author: Ankit Sultana
 * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
#include <iostream>
#include <map>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <set>
#include <cassert>
#define LL long long
#define PB push_back
#define SWAP(a,b) a^=b,b^=a,a^=b
#define MP make_pair
#define vi vector<int>
#define vll vector<LL>
#define REP(i,n)	for(__typeof(n) i = 0; i < n; i++)
#define REP1(i,n)	for(__typeof(n) i = 1; i <= n; i++)
#define REPc(i,j,n)	for(__typeof(n) i = j; i <= n; i++)
#define F first
#define S second
#define smax(a, b) a = max(a, b)
#define smin(a, b) a = min(a, b)
#define SZ(a) int(a.size())
#define SZll(a) (LL)(a.size())
#define MAXN 20003
#define MAXM 502
#define DECODE(x) int(x-'0')

using namespace std;
int mod, l;

template<typename T> T gcd(T a, T b) { return b == 0?a: gcd(b, a % b); }
template<typename T> T LCM(T a, T b) { return a*(b/gcd(a, b)); }
template<typename T> T expo(T b, T e, const T &m){if(e <= 1)return e == 0?1: b;\
	return (e&1) == 0?expo((b*b)%m, e>>1, m): (b*expo((b*b)%m, e>>1, m))%m;}
template<typename T> T modinv(T a) { return expo(a, mod-2, mod); }

int q;
string s;

LL dp[MAXN][MAXM];

int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin>>s;
	int size = int(SZ(s));
	cin>>q;
	while(q--){
		REP(i,MAXN){
			REP(j,MAXM){
				dp[i][j] = 0;  
			}
		}
		cin>>mod>>l;
		REP(i,size){
			dp[i][DECODE(s[i])%mod]++;
		}
		REPc(i,1,size-1){
			REP(j,mod){
				LL ldash = (j*10+DECODE(s[i])) % mod;
				dp[i][ldash] += dp[i-1][j];
			}
		}
		LL res = 0;
		REP(i,size){
			res += dp[i][l];  
		}
		cout<<res<<'\n';
	}
	return 0;
}
